tosdr.case: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner

title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner
quoteText:
We always appreciate your feedback and other suggestions about our products and services. But you should know that we may use them without any restriction or obligation to compensate you, and we are under no obligation to keep them confidential.
  • We reserve all rights not expressly granted to you.
